column4: What can I do to install a package (libz321) on my computer if I can only boot into recovery from grub?
I'm pretty sure you can use apt-get while in recovery mode
well if you know exactly what packages you want, you could put them on a thumb drive and use gdebi to install them
you can usually just cd to it, it'll be something like /media/disk, or some other folder in /media
